@graph.rdfs:label: PF Organisation Ontology
@graph.dct:title: PF Organisation Ontology - Platform Common Multi-dimensional Customer Targeting & Relationship Management
@graph.dct:description: A comprehensive, AI-ready, platform-agnostic semantic framework for multi-dimensional customer targeting, qualification, and relationship management. Designed as a common foundation for any business platform requiring systematic organization intelligence.
pf:designPrinciples: Platform Agnostic - Works with any business platform
@graph.pf:applicability: Universal - Any business platform requiring organization intelligence

@graph.rdfs:label: Organisation
@graph.rdfs:comment: Core entity representing any business, government, or organizational entity in a platform ecosystem
@graph.skos:definition: An organized entity such as a company, government agency, nonprofit, or other institution that can be a target customer, client, partner, or competitor
@graph.pf:usageContext: Primary entity for all organizational relationships in any business platform
@graph.pf:aiAgentCapability: AI agents can discover, enrich, analyze, and score organizations through progressive phase-based enrichment

@graph.rdfs:label: Target Organisation
@graph.rdfs:comment: An organization identified as a potential customer or prospect

@graph.rdfs:label: Client Organisation
@graph.rdfs:comment: An organization that has an active customer relationship

@graph.rdfs:label: Competitor Organisation
@graph.rdfs:comment: An organization identified as a competitor to a target or client

@graph.rdfs:label: Partner Organisation
@graph.rdfs:comment: An organization with a strategic partnership relationship

@graph.rdfs:label: Organisation ID
@graph.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier for the organization within the platform system

@graph.rdfs:label: Batch ID
@graph.rdfs:comment: Identifier for the batch import that created this organization record

@graph.rdfs:label: Platform Context
@graph.rdfs:comment: Which platform module or service line this organization is associated with
@graph.pf:note: Platform-specific values should be defined by implementing organization

@graph.rdfs:label: Relationship Type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Nature of the relationship with this organization

@graph.rdfs:label: Engagement Status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Current stage of engagement with this organization

@graph.rdfs:label: Account Owner
@graph.rdfs:comment: Person responsible for managing this organization relationship

@graph.rdfs:label: Business Category
@graph.rdfs:comment: High-level classification of business type

@graph.rdfs:label: Raw Business Type
@graph.rdfs:comment: Original business type description as provided

@graph.rdfs:label: Industry
@graph.rdfs:comment: Industry sector classification

@graph.rdfs:label: Discovery Status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Tracks the progressive discovery and enrichment of organization data

@graph.rdfs:label: Discovery Status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Composite object tracking data discovery progress

@graph.rdfs:label: Discovery Phase
@graph.rdfs:comment: Current phase in the 16-phase discovery process

@graph.rdfs:label: Data Completeness
@graph.rdfs:comment: Percentage of required data fields that are populated

@graph.rdfs:label: Data Populated
@graph.rdfs:comment: List of fields that have been populated with data

@graph.rdfs:label: Data Required
@graph.rdfs:comment: List of fields that still need to be discovered

@graph.rdfs:label: Strategic Assessment
@graph.rdfs:comment: Comprehensive strategic assessment of the organization

@graph.rdfs:label: Strategic Assessment
@graph.rdfs:comment: Comprehensive assessment of organization's strategic position and capabilities

@graph.rdfs:label: Maturity Level
@graph.rdfs:comment: Overall organizational maturity score

@graph.rdfs:label: Market Context
@graph.rdfs:comment: Market positioning and competitive context

@graph.rdfs:label: Market Context
@graph.rdfs:comment: Information about organization's market position and competitive landscape

@graph.rdfs:label: Target Market
@graph.rdfs:comment: Primary market(s) the organization operates in

@graph.rdfs:label: Competitive Position
@graph.rdfs:comment: Assessment of competitive standing

@graph.rdfs:label: Performance Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Assessment of organization's performance and capabilities

@graph.rdfs:label: Performance Profile
@graph.rdfs:comment: Analysis of organization's performance metrics and capabilities

@graph.rdfs:label: Current Performance Score
@graph.rdfs:comment: Quantitative assessment of current performance (0-100)

@graph.rdfs:label: Performance Gaps
@graph.rdfs:comment: Identified gaps in performance or capabilities

@graph.rdfs:label: Metadata
@graph.rdfs:comment: System metadata about the organization record

@graph.rdfs:label: Organisation Metadata
@graph.rdfs:comment: System metadata tracking record management

@graph.rdfs:label: Created Date
@graph.rdfs:comment: When this organization record was created

@graph.rdfs:label: Last Modified
@graph.rdfs:comment: When this organization record was last updated

@graph.rdfs:label: Data Quality
@graph.rdfs:comment: Assessment of overall data quality

@graph.rdfs:label: Requires Enrichment
@graph.rdfs:comment: Boolean flag indicating if record needs enrichment

@graph.rdfs:label: Agent Processing Status
@graph.rdfs:comment: Current status of AI agent processing

@graph.rdfs:label: Business Rules
@graph.rdfs:comment: Collection of business rules governing organization data

@graph.rdfs:label: Unique Organization ID
@graph.pf:description: Every organization must have a unique orgId
@graph.pf:validation: orgId must match pattern ^[A-Z]\d+-\d{4}$ and be unique across all organizations

@graph.rdfs:label: Website URL Format
@graph.pf:description: Website URLs must be valid and normalized
@graph.pf:validation: schema:url must be valid HTTP/HTTPS URL

@graph.rdfs:label: Discovery Phase Progression
@graph.pf:description: Organizations must progress through phases sequentially
@graph.pf:validation: Cannot skip from P1 to P5; must complete intermediate phases

@graph.rdfs:label: Minimum Contact Information
@graph.pf:description: Organizations should have at least one contact method
@graph.pf:validation: Must have email OR phone OR contactPoint populated

@graph.rdfs:label: Platform Context Required
@graph.pf:description: Every organization must be assigned to at least one platform module
@graph.pf:validation: platformContext must contain at least one value
